Entity.Description: This transaction table stores the counts done for the task.
Entity.Name: Count

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_COUNT table.
Attribute.Name: Count_Key

Attribute.Description: The count request key that is associated with this count.
Attribute.Name: Count_Request_Key

Attribute.Description: The task id that is associated with this count table.
Attribute.Name: Task_Id

Attribute.Description: The summary task identifier.
Attribute.Name: Summary_Task_Id

Attribute.Description: The parent task identifier for multi user tasks.
Attribute.Name: Parent_Task_Id

Attribute.Description: A two-digit code that identifies the task type.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this count.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: Indicates the organization to which the inventory belongs.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: A Location in the node where count was performed.
Attribute.Name: Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The original location of the inventory being counted.
Attribute.Name: Original_Location

Attribute.Description: The case/pallet License Plate Number for which the count results are recorded.
Attribute.Name: LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The LPN that has includes other LPN inside it.
Attribute.Name: Parent_LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The system defined values for the LPN type associated with the LPN number for which the count results are recorded. Currently, the system supports only CASE and PALLET LPN types.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Type

Attribute.Description: The item's item ID that was counted.
Attribute.Name: Item_Id

Attribute.Description: The item's unit of measure.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: The inventory classification of the item, classified based on the product's characteristics. Typical examples are FQ - First Quality, SQ - Second Quality, and so on.
Attribute.Name: Product_Class

Attribute.Description: The serial number that was generated during the count process.
Attribute.Name: Serial_No

Attribute.Description: A unique key for the inventory status table. This key refers to an inventory sub-classification based on the results of the inventory control processes within the warehouse.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status

Attribute.Description: Whenever the inventory is customized, it needs to be tracked separately. This field indicates the buyer or buyer category for whom the inventory is customized.
Attribute.Name: Segment_Type

Attribute.Description: Whenever the inventory is customized for a specific order, it needs to be tracked separately so that it can be allocated to that order.
Attribute.Name: Segment

Attribute.Description: The date by which the item must be shipped so that it is usable. This is also referred to as the expiration date.
Attribute.Name: Ship_By_Date

Attribute.Description: The inventory tag key that is associated with this count.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Tag_Key

Attribute.Description: Indicates the tag number associated with the inventory.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Number

Attribute.Description: The physically counted quantity for the count criteria.
Attribute.Name: Count_Quantity

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This configuration table stores count programs that are used to perform cycle counting in a warehouse.
Entity.Name: Count_Program

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_COUNT_PROGRAM table.
Attribute.Name: Count_Program_Key

Attribute.Description: A name assigned to the count program by either a node or an enterprise.
Attribute.Name: Count_Program_Name

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this count program.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The count calendar key that is associated with this count program.
Attribute.Name: Count_Calendar_Key

Attribute.Description: The enterprise code associated with the count program.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The owner key that is associated with this count program.
Attribute.Name: Owner_Key

Attribute.Description: The region key that is associated with this count program.
Attribute.Name: Region_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the count program type. The values defined are provided as common code values in FC for the code type 'COUNT_ENTITY_NAME'.
Attribute.Name: Count_Entity_Name

Attribute.Description: The user who requested for the count program.
Attribute.Name: Requesting_User_Id

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the earliest date and time when a task should start. This timestamp is stamped on each task.
Attribute.Name: Start_No_Earlier_Than

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the finish date and time when a task should finish. This timestamp is stamped on each task.
Attribute.Name: Finish_No_Later_Than

Attribute.Description: The priority of the count requests generated for the count program.
Attribute.Name: Priority

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the count request type.
Attribute.Name: Request_Type

Attribute.Description: The current status of the count program. The status is applicable only when the count program type is 'OneTime'.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: The date from when the count program is valid.
Attribute.Name: Effective_From_Date

Attribute.Description: The date till when the count program is valid.
Attribute.Name: Effective_To_Date

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This configuration table stores count program conditions such as enterprise and item classifications to perform cycle count in a warehouse.
Entity.Name: Count_Program_Condition

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_COUNT_PROGRAM_COND table.
Attribute.Name: Count_Program_Condition_Key

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_COUNT_PROGRAM table.
Attribute.Name: Count_Program_Key

Attribute.Description: A brief description of the count program condition.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the items are classified as first for the count program.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification1

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the items are classified as second for the count program.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification2

Attribute.Description: This field indicates that the items are classified as third for the count program.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification3

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the item for which the count request should be generated.
Attribute.Name: Item_Id

Attribute.Description: This is the percentage of locations or items that user wants to count.
Attribute.Name: Percent_To_Count

Attribute.Description: This value will indicate whether the counting is being done at Item level, Item classification level or location level.
Attribute.Name: Count_Level

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the unit of measure of the item that needs to be counted.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the count tasks are created at an item level classification.
Attribute.Name: Count_At_Item_Classification_Level

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the number of times the inventory should be counted.
Attribute.Name: No_Of_Times_To_Count

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the minimum unit cost of an item that can be put on count.
Attribute.Name: Min_Unit_Value

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the maximum unit cost of an item that can be put on count.
Attribute.Name: Max_Unit_Value

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This configuration table stores criteria such as zones and product classes to perform cycle count in a warehouse.
Entity.Name: Count_Program_Condition_Attr

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CNT_PROG_COND_ATTR table.
Attribute.Name: Count_Program_Condition_Attr_Key

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CNT_PROG_COND table.
Attribute.Name: Count_Program_Condition_Key

Attribute.Description: The various count program condition attributes such as ZONE and PRODUCT_CLASS.
Attribute.Name: Attr_Name

Attribute.Description: The attribute value identified by the ATTRIBUTE_NAME.
Attribute.Name: Value

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This transaction table stores count program condition status such as the last enterprise, location, item, etc that are already counted.
Entity.Name: Count_Program_Condition_State

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CNT_PROG_COND_STATE table.
Attribute.Name: Count_Program_Condition_State_Key

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_CNT_PROG_COND table.
Attribute.Name: Count_Program_Condition_Key

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with the count program condition state.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The last item that was counted in the node.
Attribute.Name: Last_Item_Id

Attribute.Description: Indicates the total number of times the items belonging to a particular criteria was counted.
Attribute.Name: No_Of_Times_Counted

Attribute.Description: The date of start of the Cycle to which current date belongs.
Attribute.Name: Current_Cycle_Start_Date

Attribute.Description: The date of end of the Cycle to which current date belongs.
Attribute.Name: Current_Cycle_End_Date

Attribute.Description: The timestamp of start of the Cycle to which current date belongs.
Attribute.Name: Current_Cycle_Start_Timestamp

Attribute.Description: The timestamp of end of the Cycle to which current date belongs.
Attribute.Name: Current_Cycle_End_Timestamp

Attribute.Description: The number of locations counted till date in the current cycle.
Attribute.Name: No_Of_Locns_Cntd

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This transaction table stores count requests to perform inventory count in a warehouse. The count process in a warehouse begins with the count request.
Entity.Name: Count_Request

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_COUNT_REQUEST table.
Attribute.Name: Count_Request_Key

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this count request list.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The enterprise for which the count request is created.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The document type associated with the count request.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: The count program name for which the count request is created.
Attribute.Name: Count_Program_Name

Attribute.Description: Indicates the owner who created the program, node or enterprise.
Attribute.Name: Count_Program_Owner_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the count request type.
Attribute.Name: Request_Type

Attribute.Description: The count request number associated with the document type and node.
Attribute.Name: Count_Request_No

Attribute.Description: This is starting location of the range of locations that the user wants to count.
Attribute.Name: From_Location

Attribute.Description: This is the end location of the range of locations that the user wants to count.
Attribute.Name: To_Location

Attribute.Description: The user who requested for the count.
Attribute.Name: Requesting_User_Id

Attribute.Description: The timestamp associated with the task. This timestamp is stamped on each task.
Attribute.Name: Start_No_Earlier_Than

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the aisle Number of the location to be counted. The locations belong to zones which have travel aisle's between them. A zone could belong to multiple aisles and multiple zones could belong to an aisle. But a location in a zone always belongs to one and only one aisle.
Attribute.Name: Aisle_Number

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the level number of the location to be counted. The height of the location (y-co-ordinate of the location from the floor) is classified as levels. The level attribute of the location is used in arriving at locations nearest to the dedicated locations algorithm used during the putaway process. Typically, the level attribute is contained within the location ID.
Attribute.Name: Level_Number

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the location's bay number that is to be counted. Typically, the aisle, level and bay put together represents the physical location of the location in a node, if they are based on coordinate system. The bay attribute of the location (x-coordinate from the beginning of the aisle) is used in arriving at locations nearest to the dedicated locations algorithm that is used in putaway. Typically, the bay attribute is contained within the location ID.
Attribute.Name: Bay_Number

Attribute.Description: The timestamp associated with the task. This timestamp is stamped on each task.
Attribute.Name: Finish_No_Later_Than

Attribute.Description: The zone where the count should be performed.
Attribute.Name: Zone_Id

Attribute.Description: The count request priority.
Attribute.Name: Priority

Attribute.Description: A Location in the node where the count should be performed. The LOCATION_ID associated with the NODE_KEY field identifies a unique location in the node.
Attribute.Name: Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The logical foreign key to the YFS_RECEIPT_HEADER table.
Attribute.Name: Receipt_Header_Key

Attribute.Description: The case or pallet License Plate Number for which count request will be created.
Attribute.Name: LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The system defined values for the LPN type associated with the LPN number for which count request is placed. Currently, the system supports only CASE and PALLET LPN types.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Type

Attribute.Description: The item to be counted.
Attribute.Name: Item_Id

Attribute.Description: The item's unit of measure.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: The first item classification for the count request.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification1

Attribute.Description: The second item classification for the count request.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification2

Attribute.Description: The third item classification for the count request.
Attribute.Name: Item_Classification3

Attribute.Description: The minimum unit cost of an item to be considered.
Attribute.Name: Min_Unit_Value

Attribute.Description: The maximum unit cost of an item to be considered.
Attribute.Name: Max_Unit_Value

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the count request is created at an item classification level.
Attribute.Name: Count_At_Item_Classification_Level

Attribute.Description: The item's inventory classification, classified based on the product's characteristics. Typical examples are, FQ - First Quality, SQ - Second Quality, and so on.
Attribute.Name: Product_Class

Attribute.Description: The current status of the count request. Some of the statuses are 1100 - Count Request Created, 1200 - Count Tasks Created, 1300 - Count Tasks Completed, 2000 - Count Request Completed and 9000 - Count Request Cancelled.
Attribute.Name: Status

Attribute.Description: A logical foreign key to the YFS_PIPELINE table.
Attribute.Name: Pipeline_Key

Attribute.Description: The cancellation reason code for canceling the count request.
Attribute.Name: Cancellation_Reason_Code

Attribute.Description: Additional information as to why the count request was cancelled.
Attribute.Name: Reason_Text

Attribute.Description: Plan Name of the physical count.
Attribute.Name: Phy_Cnt_Plan_Name

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This transaction table stores results of the count requests.
Entity.Name: Count_Result

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_COUNT_RESULT table.
Attribute.Name: Count_Result_Key

Attribute.Description: The count request key that is associated with this count result.
Attribute.Name: Count_Request_Key

Attribute.Description: The task id that is associated with this count result.
Attribute.Name: Task_Id

Attribute.Description: The summary task identifier associated with the count result.
Attribute.Name: Summary_Task_Id

Attribute.Description: This field is a two-digit code that identifies the task type.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this count result.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The organization to which the inventory belongs.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: A Location in the node where count was performed.
Attribute.Name: Location_Id

Attribute.Description: The original location of inventory counted.
Attribute.Name: Original_Location

Attribute.Description: The case/pallet License Plate Number for which count results are recorded.
Attribute.Name: LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The LPN that has includes other LPN inside it.
Attribute.Name: Parent_LPN_No

Attribute.Description: The system defined values for the LPN type associated with the LPN number for which the count results are recorded. Currently, the system supports only CASE and PALLET LPN types.
Attribute.Name: LPN_Type

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the item that was counted.
Attribute.Name: Item_Id

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the item's unit of measure.
Attribute.Name: Uom

Attribute.Description: The inventory classification of the item that is classified based on the product characteristics.
Attribute.Name: Product_Class

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the serial number that was generated during the count process.
Attribute.Name: Serial_No

Attribute.Description: This field is a unique key for the YFS_INVENTORY_STATUS table. This field refers to an inventory sub-classification based on the inventory control process results within the warehouse.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Status

Attribute.Description: Whenever inventory is customized, it needs to be tracked separately. This field indicates the buyer or buyer category for whom the inventory is customized.
Attribute.Name: Segment_Type

Attribute.Description: Whenever the inventory is customized for a specific order, the inventory needs to be tracked separately. This field indicates the order to which the inventory is allocated.
Attribute.Name: Segment

Attribute.Description: The date by which the item must be shipped so that it is usable. This is also referred to as the expiration date.
Attribute.Name: Ship_By_Date

Attribute.Description: The inventory tag key that is associated with this count result.
Attribute.Name: Inventory_Tag_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the tag number associated with the inventory.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Number

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the system reported quantity for the count criteria.
Attribute.Name: System_Quantity

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the physically counted quantity for the count criteria.
Attribute.Name: Count_Quantity

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the difference between the count quantity and system quantity.
Attribute.Name: Variance_Quantity

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the variance percentage which is calculated as 100* VARIANCE_QUANTITY divided by SYSTEM_QUANTITY.
Attribute.Name: Variance_Percentage

Attribute.Description: This field determines the variance type based on the count results. If the Variance Quantity > 0, the Variance Type for the items will be 'New', 'Missing' if the Variance Quantity < 0, and 'No Variance' if the Variance Quantity = 0. However, for License Plates the Variance Type will not be computed based on the Variance Quantity. Instead, the Variance Type will be set to 'New' if a Case/Pallet is found in the location, but does not exist in the system inventory of the location, 'Missing' if the Case/Pallet is not found in the location, but exists in the system inventory of the location, 'No Variance' in situations when there is no count discrepancy.
Attribute.Name: Variance_Type

Attribute.Description: This field is computed as the summation of VARIANCE_QUANTITY * UNIT_COST for all tasks in the count request for the latest completed iteration.
Attribute.Name: Variance_Value

Attribute.Description: This field indicates if the variance was accepted for the count result.
Attribute.Name: Variance_Accepted

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the variance can be resolved for the count result.
Attribute.Name: Is_Resolvable

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This transaction table stores tag information of the inventory that resulted after counting.
Entity.Name: Count_Result_Tag

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_COUNT_RESULT_TAG table.
Attribute.Name: Count_Result_Tag_Key

Attribute.Description: The count result key that is associated with this count result tag.
Attribute.Name: Count_Result_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the tag number associated with the inventory.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Number

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the lot number associated with the inventory.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Number

Attribute.Description: This field stores reference information of the lot number.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Key_Reference

Attribute.Description: The date on which the lot was manufactured.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Manufacture_Date

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the lot number attribute.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Attribute1

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the lot number attribute.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Attribute2

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the lot number attribute.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Attribute3

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the revision number associated with the tag.
Attribute.Name: Revision_No

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the batch number associated with the tag.
Attribute.Name: Batch_No

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This configuration table stores parameters used to determine the task type for a task associated with the task type group count.
Entity.Name: Count_Strategy

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_COUNT_STRATEGY table.
Attribute.Name: Count_Strategy_Key

Attribute.Description: A brief description of the count strategy.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: This field is a short two-digit code that identifies the task type.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag is applicable when strategy is defined for a zone. This flag indicates whether the count tasks are generated for all locations without verifying the inventory availability in the zone.
Attribute.Name: Count_Location_Even_If_No_Inventory

Attribute.Description: The activity group system defined. This field indicates the task type that should be associated to an activity group.
Attribute.Name: Activity_Group_Id

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the organization code of the node.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the task granularity with which the count tasks will be performed.
Attribute.Name: Task_Granularity

Attribute.Description: The enterprise key that is associated with this count strategy.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Key

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the zone for which the count request was created.
Attribute.Name: Zone_Id

Attribute.Description: This field defines the location capacity. This field maps to the primary key of the YFS_LOCATION_SIZE_CODE table.
Attribute.Name: Location_Size_Code

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the transaction ID of the count request for which the count strategy is determined.
Attribute.Name: Transaction_Id

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the first item classification for determining the count strategy.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type_Item_Classification1

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the second item classification for determining the count strategy.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type_Item_Classification2

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the third item classification for determining the count strategy.
Attribute.Name: Task_Type_Item_Classification3

Attribute.Description: This field defines the count strategy differently for different request types.
Attribute.Name: Request_Type

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Entity.Description: This transaction table stores tag information of the inventory that resulted after counting.
Entity.Name: Count_Tag

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_COUNT_TAG table.
Attribute.Name: Count_Tag_Key

Attribute.Description: The count key that is associated with this count tag.
Attribute.Name: Count_Key

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the tag number associated with the inventory.
Attribute.Name: Tag_Number

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the lot number associated with the inventory.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Number

Attribute.Description: This field stores reference information of the lot number.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Key_Reference

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the date on which the lot was manufactured.

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the lot number attribute.

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the lot number attribute.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Attribute2

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the lot number attribute.
Attribute.Name: Lot_Attribute3

Attribute.Description: This field indicates the revision number associated with the tag.

Attribute.Description: This field specifies the batch number associated with the tag.

Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyuserid

Attribute.Description: The program that created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createprogid

Attribute.Description: The program that modified this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyprogid

Attribute.Description: An integer used to track and prevent concurrent modifications.
Attribute.Name: Lockid

Entity.Description: This transaction table stores information of the inventory that was counted in a particular cycle count period.
Entity.Name: Item_Count_State

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_ITEM_COUNT_STATE table.
Attribute.Name: Item_Count_State_Key

Attribute.Description: The node key that is associated with this count program.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: The enterprise code associated with the count program.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The item that has been counted.
Attribute.Name: Item_Id

Attribute.Description: The date at which this item was put on count.
Attribute.Name: Last_Counted_Date

Attribute.Description: The date at which this item was put on count.
Attribute.Name: Last_Counted_Timestamp

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the creation of this record.
Attribute.Name: Createts

Attribute.Description: The timestamp for the last modification of this record.
Attribute.Name: Modifyts

Attribute.Description: The user who created this record.
Attribute.Name: Createuserid

Attribute.Description: The user who last modified this record.

Entity.Description: This transaction table is to store the values of a planned physical count in a warehouse.
Entity.Name: Phy_Cnt_Plan

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_PHY_CNT_PLAN table.
Attribute.Name: Phy_Cnt_Plan_Key

Attribute.Description: Node for which physical count plan is setup.
Attribute.Name: Node_Key

Attribute.Description: Plan Name of the physical count.
Attribute.Name: Phy_Cnt_Plan_Name

Attribute.Description: The enterprise code associated with the physical count plan.
Attribute.Name: Enterprise_Code

Attribute.Description: The date of start of the physical count plan.
Attribute.Name: Physical_Count_Start_Date

Attribute.Description: The duration of the physical count plan.
